listitem.para: void GPIO_Init ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, GPIO_InitTypeDef * GPIO_InitStruct)
void GPIO_PinLockConfig ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
uint8_t GPIO_ReadInputDataBit ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
uint8_t GPIO_ReadOutputDataBit ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
void GPIO_SetBits ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
void GPIO_ResetBits ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
void GPIO_WriteBit ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin, BitAction BitVal)
void GPIO_Write ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, uint16_t PortVal)
void GPIO_ToggleBits ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
void GPIO_PinAFConfig ( GPIO_TypeDef * GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_PinSource, uint8_t GPIO_AF)

#define IS_GPIO_ALL_PERIPH (((PERIPH) == GPIOA) || \ ((PERIPH) == GPIOB) || \ ((PERIPH) == GPIOC) || \ ((PERIPH) == GPIOD) || \ ((PERIPH) == GPIOE) || \ ((PERIPH) == GPIOF) || \ ((PERIPH) == GPIOG) || \ ((PERIPH) == GPIOH) || \ ((PERIPH) == GPIOI))

section.title: enum GPIOMode_TypeDef
enum GPIOOType_TypeDef
enum GPIOSpeed_TypeDef
enum GPIOPuPd_TypeDef
enum BitAction
void GPIO_DeInit (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx)
section.emphasis: Deinitializes the GPIOx peripheral registers to their default reset values.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: By default, The GPIO pins are configured in input floating mode (except JTAG pins).

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.

section.title: void GPIO_Init (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx, GPIO_InitTypeDef *GPIO_InitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the GPIOx peripheral according to the specified parameters in the GPIO_InitStruct.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
pointer to a GPIO_InitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the specified GPIO peripheral.

section.title: void GPIO_StructInit (GPIO_InitTypeDef *GPIO_InitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each GPIO_InitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: : pointer to a GPIO_InitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: The locked registers are GPIOx_MODER, GPIOx_OTYPER, GPIOx_OSPEEDR, GPIOx_PUPDR, GPIOx_AFRL and GPIOx_AFRH.
The configuration of the locked GPIO pins can no longer be modified until the next reset.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
specifies the port bit to be locked. This parameter can be any combination of GPIO_Pin_x where x can be (0..15).

section.title: uint8_t GPIO_ReadInputDataBit (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
section.emphasis: Reads the specified input port pin.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
specifies the port bit to read. This parameter can be GPIO_Pin_x where x can be (0..15).
input port pin value.

section.title: uint16_t GPIO_ReadInputData (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx)
section.emphasis: Reads the specified GPIO input data port.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
input data port value.

section.title: uint8_t GPIO_ReadOutputDataBit (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
section.emphasis: Reads the specified output data port bit.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
specifies the port bit to read. This parameter can be GPIO_Pin_x where x can be (0..15).
output port pin value.

section.title: uint16_t GPIO_ReadOutputData (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx)
section.emphasis: Reads the specified GPIO output data port.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
output data port value.

section.title: void GPIO_SetBits (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
section.emphasis: Sets the selected data port bits.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: This functions uses GPIOx_BSRR register to allow atomic read/modify accesses. In this way, there is no risk of an IRQ occurring between the read and the modify access.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
specifies the port bits to be written. This parameter can be any combination of GPIO_Pin_x where x can be (0..15).

section.title: void GPIO_ResetBits (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin)
section.emphasis: Clears the selected data port bits.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: This functions uses GPIOx_BSRR register to allow atomic read/modify accesses. In this way, there is no risk of an IRQ occurring between the read and the modify access.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
specifies the port bits to be written. This parameter can be any combination of GPIO_Pin_x where x can be (0..15).

section.title: void GPIO_WriteBit (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_Pin, BitAction BitVal)
section.emphasis: Sets or clears the selected data port bit.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
specifies the port bit to be written. This parameter can be one of GPIO_Pin_x where x can be (0..15).

specifies the value to be written to the selected bit. This parameter can be one of the BitAction enum values:
Bit_RESET: to clear the port pin
Bit_SET: to set the port pin

section.title: void GPIO_Write (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx, uint16_t PortVal)
section.emphasis: Writes data to the specified GPIO data port.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
specifies the value to be written to the port output data register.
where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
Specifies the pins to be toggled.

section.title: void GPIO_PinAFConfig (GPIO_TypeDef *GPIOx, uint16_t GPIO_PinSource, uint8_t GPIO_AF)
section.emphasis: Changes the mapping of the specified pin.

entry.para: where x can be (A..I) to select the GPIO peripheral.
specifies the pin for the Alternate function. This parameter can be GPIO_PinSourcex where x can be (0..15).

selects the pin to used as Alternate function. This parameter can be one of the following values:
GPIO_AF_RTC_50Hz: Connect RTC_50Hz pin to AF0 (default after reset)
GPIO_AF_MCO: Connect MCO pin (MCO1 and MCO2) to AF0 (default after reset)
GPIO_AF_TAMPER: Connect TAMPER pins (TAMPER_1 and TAMPER_2) to AF0 (default after reset)
GPIO_AF_SWJ: Connect SWJ pins (SWD and JTAG)to AF0 (default after reset)
GPIO_AF_TRACE: Connect TRACE pins to AF0 (default after reset)
GPIO_AF_TIM1: Connect TIM1 pins to AF1
GPIO_AF_TIM2: Connect TIM2 pins to AF1
GPIO_AF_TIM3: Connect TIM3 pins to AF2
GPIO_AF_TIM4: Connect TIM4 pins to AF2
GPIO_AF_TIM5: Connect TIM5 pins to AF2
GPIO_AF_TIM8: Connect TIM8 pins to AF3
GPIO_AF_TIM9: Connect TIM9 pins to AF3
GPIO_AF_TIM10: Connect TIM10 pins to AF3
GPIO_AF_TIM11: Connect TIM11 pins to AF3
GPIO_AF_I2C1: Connect I2C1 pins to AF4
GPIO_AF_I2C2: Connect I2C2 pins to AF4
GPIO_AF_I2C3: Connect I2C3 pins to AF4
GPIO_AF_SPI1: Connect SPI1 pins to AF5
GPIO_AF_SPI2: Connect SPI2/I2S2 pins to AF5
GPIO_AF_SPI3: Connect SPI3/I2S3 pins to AF6
GPIO_AF_I2S3ext: Connect I2S3ext pins to AF7
GPIO_AF_USART1: Connect USART1 pins to AF7
GPIO_AF_USART2: Connect USART2 pins to AF7
GPIO_AF_USART3: Connect USART3 pins to AF7
GPIO_AF_UART4: Connect UART4 pins to AF8
GPIO_AF_UART5: Connect UART5 pins to AF8
GPIO_AF_USART6: Connect USART6 pins to AF8
GPIO_AF_CAN1: Connect CAN1 pins to AF9
GPIO_AF_CAN2: Connect CAN2 pins to AF9
GPIO_AF_TIM12: Connect TIM12 pins to AF9
GPIO_AF_TIM13: Connect TIM13 pins to AF9
GPIO_AF_TIM14: Connect TIM14 pins to AF9
GPIO_AF_OTG_FS: Connect OTG_FS pins to AF10
GPIO_AF_OTG_HS: Connect OTG_HS pins to AF10
GPIO_AF_ETH: Connect ETHERNET pins to AF11
GPIO_AF_FSMC: Connect FSMC pins to AF12
GPIO_AF_OTG_HS_FS: Connect OTG HS (configured in FS) pins to AF12
GPIO_AF_SDIO: Connect SDIO pins to AF12
GPIO_AF_DCMI: Connect DCMI pins to AF13
GPIO_AF_EVENTOUT: Connect EVENTOUT pins to AF15
